data.comment: This is the 'Dear so-and-so' salutation at the beginning of a letter.

data.name: PurchaseOrder_NotifyPendingApproverBody1
data.value:
ユーザーさん

次の注文書:

PO/WO 番号: {ObjectNumber}
記述: {Description}
合計金額: {TotalPOAmount:#,##0.00}
開始日: {DateOfOrder:dd-MMM-yyyy}
終了日: {EndDate:dd-MMM-yyyy}

Has been submitted for approvals from the following user(s) (order by Approval Limit):
data.comment: IMPORTANT: Do not remove the <HTML> tags. Translate only the text between <body> and </body>

data.name: PurchaseOrder_NotifyPendingApproverSubject
data.value: PO/WO number : {0} is submitted for your approval

Description: {Description}

User
